channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Calls Russia’s Strike on Sumy a ‘Mistake’
item.description: At least 34 people were killed in the attack on Sumy, which came as Ukraine’s leader urged President Trump to come witness the realities of war firsth...

item.title: U.S. Argues Meta Built a Social Media Monopoly
item.description: The tech giant went to court on Monday in an antitrust trial focused on its acquisitions of Instagram and WhatsApp. The case could reshape its busines...

item.title: Getting CEO succession planning right: Managing the emotional undercurrents
item.description: By understanding the human dynamics at play, boards can mitigate the risks and increase the chances of a successful handover.

item.title: Blue Origin Flight Takes 6 Women, Including Gayle King and Katy Perry, to Space
item.description: The women made a 10-minute trip on Blue Origin’s New Shepard rocket, as the first all-female space crew in more than 60 years.

item.title: What We Know About the Arson Attack on Gov. Josh Shapiro’s House in Pennsylvania
item.description: The governor was forced to evacuate the residence with his family. The authorities have charged a man with attempted murder, arson and terrorism.

item.title: Trump calls on FCC chair to impose ‘maximum fines and punishment’ on Paramount’s CBS over 60 Minutes
item.description: Donald Trump took issue with its 60 Minutes news program after it aired two segments regarding the war in Ukraine and his plan to annex Denmark’s auto...

item.title: No panic: How Snowflake’s cofounder translated free-diving skills to tech success
item.description: Benoit Dageville says panic almost always leads to a bad decision, whether in business, AI, or deep underwater.

item.title: She was one of the youngest general partners in venture capital. Now she’s at the forefront of AI investing
item.description: Sarah Guo invests in the next frontier of AI through her firm Conviction.

item.title: It’s time to reimagine health-care education
item.description: Non-traditional education programs play a critical role in stemming health-care workforce shortages.

item.title: This Kidney Was Frozen for 10 Days. Could Surgeons Transplant It?
item.description: Scientists developed a way to freeze a large mammal’s kidney, which could ease organ shortages in the future. First, they had to see if their method w...

item.title: Military Leader Wins Presidential Election in Gabon
item.description: Brice Oligui Nguema had promised to relinquish power after he led a coup in 2023. He now is set to lead the oil-rich country for the next seven years.

item.title: With Trump’s Tariffs, Europe Fears a Flood of Cheap Goods From China
item.description: President Trump’s tariffs on China could lead to a hazardous scenario for European countries: the dumping of artificially cheap products that could un...

item.title: Trump Says He Was Told Russia’s Deadly Strike Was a ‘Mistake’
item.description: It was not immediately clear what President Trump meant when he said he had been told Russia “made a mistake” with its missile strike on the Ukrainian...

item.title: Pete Marocco, Who Helped Gut Foreign Aid for Trump, Leaves State Department
